name: ​Depths of Mind
description:
Depths of Mind is a story about Matt who recently lost his job. Follow his week-long journey as he has to deal with the slow weight of his own mind closing in, plunging deeper and deeper into the darkness. This was Studio Halfbaked’s first project together and we’re proud of what we made. Ludum Dare 48 was a great experience and we hope you like what we made.

  • W A S D to move
  • [Space] to interact
  • Minigames are click and drag 

(for the dish game make sure to drag the dishes all the way to the edge of the sink)
